author: jstrachan
msg: Patched so that by default new tag libraries will percolate up the parent context stack unless explicitly disabled.
The JellyUnit <test:case> disables all exporting of variables and tag libraries up the parent stack so that test cases cannot interfere with each other.
This should hopefully fix the problems that were introduced that Stephen Haberman found.

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied Vinay Chandran's patches for Embedded
